text: Jean-Claude André Adolphe Hamel (9 July 1929 – 2 June 2020) was a French businessman. He was the President of AJ Auxerre from 1963 to 2009. In 2002, he was made Chevalier of the Légion d'honneur. Hamel was born in Auxerre, France. Hamel died on 2 June 2020 in Appoigny, France, aged 90.Jean-Claude Hamel, une vie de passion ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Auxerre
title: Jean-Claude Hamel
